name: I'm Boned
description:
Welcome to I'm Boned! A puzzle platformer game about bones and mind control.

In I'm Boned, you take the role of a magic skull, capable of controlling telephatically other bone pieces.

Due to his tragic involvment in the "Capetinha's" incident, he was locked away in a dungeon full of curious looking platforms.

In an attempt to escape, he must utilize his flexibility as a living skeleton, separating and assembling himself and his bones to move around various puzzles, in search for his freedom.

Developed by:

Pedro Henrique d' Avila Pereira, Campus Balnéario Camboriú.

Lorenzo Grando, Campus Balnéario Camboriú.

Iago Theodoro de Faria Souza, Campus Balnéario Camboriú.

A UNIVALI Game Jam Project.
